Not sure what you mean, but our scamper ramp is up against the wall by the steps on one side. I have the large one and it sits almost perfectly on the first step up against the side. I don't think it would work well with my dogs if it was floating freely. I have Westies and they use it to get out constantly. They know to swim towards it when they are in the pool. But it does not have a railing. Susan J. Meyer &#183 July 2, 2013 ... You don't need railing for the skamper ...
